about:
***Lions Club of Bangalore Prerana*** is part of ***Lions International, District 317-E***, chartered on ***March 2022*** by Lion Sowmya B. A., PMJF as its Charter President.

The club was chartered with a team of 21 members who aspire to serve the less fortunate within the local community and to maintain a clean and green environment. 

***The focus areas of the team are*** 

* Environment
* Health and Hygiene
* Education and awareness program
* Women and youth empowerment with skill development training programs
* Vocational training programs to build economic foundation
* Care for the aged and disabled
* Need based humanitarian services

***Club Awards and Achievements***

* 2022-23: ***International President's Gold Medal***, was awarded to the Club President Lion Sowmya B.A.,PMJF
* 2022-23: ***Model Club***, 1st club in District 317-E to become 100% Model Club within 1 year of making the pledge. 
* 2022-23: ***Club Excellence Award*** was awarded, the very first year for the commitment towards service. 
* 2022-24: Lion Sowmya B.A., PMJF was elevated to be the ***Zone Chairperson*** of Zone-3, Region-2, District 317-E with 4 Clubs
* 2023-25: Lion Sowmya B.A.,PMJF was made ***LDSF Trustee***, based on her commitment to service the society.

officers.name: Lion Dr. Shiva Shankar G. N., PMJF
officers.title: Club President
